tags: None
review:
Dr. Gautam was quite friendly. He listened to my problems patiently & did the diagnosis. He was very meticulous in his approach. The staff were also helpful.
I recommend Dr. Gautam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The Doctor was very friendly and patient . Even though we reached 15 min late of the appointment time and the Doctor was about to leave , he examined me and heard to me very patiently *** **** *** ***** ******** * I was not able to sleep in the night due to high BP and other problems . Within one day , I am all set and I am very happy with the treatment. 
Thank you Dr. Gautam .

tags: None
review: Very nice experience, gave the right medication, ********** **** ********* *** *********** was very approachable. I would strongly recommend him for firstline treatment and should it need any specific department to be consulted he will genuinely refer to the right doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: very patient in listening to the problems, explained his diagnosis and proposed treatment.my father was admitted in his care at KIMS hospital for 7 days, and 10 days after his discharge, Dr gautam remembered him by name and treatment. doesn't insist for unnecessary tests or place of tests

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I took my Mother to visit Dr. Gautam, as she is of a certain age now and has issues. My father also has many ailments. They do not have a family doctor and wanted to show Dr Gautam their history and issues and some solutions for the recent issues shown in tests. I saw that he has great reviews here and so we chose to go with him. Unfortunately, our experience was as bad ** * ****** ***** *** *** He kept asking what the exact problem is. My Mother has multiple issues and needed to consult a general physician. Yet, he sounded like this would have been better if we came with an exact issue, **** * ***** *** *** ** ******** ** ******* *** he started saying, "Ok Then.." so we can leave. At the end he said I dont have time, and sent us out. It was 8:51. He said he stays only till 8:30. But if you check Practo, he left appointments open even for 8:50. This was unfortunately a bad experience for us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I believe a doctor is all about diagnosis..diagnosis is all about time and patience. Dr. Gautam gives a patient both time and hears you with patience. And he allows you to speak up your issues, his medicines are really working well for me. highly recommend him.

tags: None
review: Overall experience is good. Doctor is really attentive and listened to me. He is very humble and he gave ample time to understand my situation. Asked repeated questions to analyse the situation. Explained my disease well and gave very few medicines. I recommend visiting Doctor P.Gautam without any hesitation.

tags: None
review:
My Mother is a diabetic patient for a long time but when she was in Hyderabad her condition deteriorated.  I got the reference of Dr Gautam from Practo and once i visited him, my mom started recovering with his prescription within two days. I have consulted him for my father's health as well and as expected my father is also recovering very well. He is now our family doctor and i recommend him to everyone...

Regards,
Anoop

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Gautam is very ethical doctor . I was admitted and treated for viral fever by Gautam sir.  He will treat with minimum medicines and gives well suited advise for curing the problem. My wife also got treated by Dr Gautam by chikungunya and we are completely satisfied with the treatment. 
Only problem that we observed is , Gautam sir will not rely on other diagnostic centre reports that we take with us. He will prefer either KIMS hospital reports or Vijaya Diagnistics reports some times.
Over all feedback is that he is good doctor and treats problem very well.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
